name: The Cursed Fight
description:
The Cursed Fight objective is to blend elements of the roguelike genre with cardgames to create a fun and not time expansive experience. 
Enter the world inside a Compendium, collect cards from fallen monsters and use them to build a stronger deck, always being aware of the dangers you are going to face. 
Choose Relics carefully as they are going to help you during your journey.
 And always remember: you are going to die. 
A lot.
